DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy novel dual drug-eluting stent ( DXR stent ) , slowly release cilostazol paclitaxel , strut coverage , malapposition , thrombus formation , assess optical coherence tomography .
DOC.brief_title: DXR Stent Vascular Healing Thrombus Formation : OCT Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient Age > =19 year Clinically indicate invasive coronary angiography Patient capable willing give write informed consent 2 . Angiographic coronary artery disease confine native coronary artery > 50 % diameter stenosis invasive coronary angiography reference diameter 2.54.0mm , lesion length â‰¤30 mm 1 . Patient Inability provide write informed consent Serious comorbidity may affect trial decision investigator Prior CABG target vessel Congestive heart failure NYHA Class III IV leave ventricular ejection fraction le 30 % Prior ST elevation myocardial infarction within 72 hour procedure Hemodynamic electrical instability include shock Serious coronary artery spasm , unrelated catheter Pregnancy possible pregnant status Allergy iodinate contrast agent Serum creatinine > =1.7 mg/dL creatinine clearance < = 30 ml/min ST elevation myocardial infarction 2 . Angiographic ( OCT ) Left main disease Severely calcify lesion Severely tortuous , TIMI flow grade 0 1 angiography , inappropriate OCT procedure investigator ' decision
